about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for an epic showdown in "Clash of Swords and Beams," where your reflexes and strategic thinking are put to the ultimate test! In this fast-paced game, you must survive and resist waves of relentless lasers and warriors. Each moment brings increasing difficulty, ensuring that standing still is never an option!

Game Features:

- Intense Action: Navigate a dynamic battlefield filled with unpredictable lasers and aggressive warriors. Stay on your toes and adapt to the ever-changing threats!
- Shield Mechanics: Your shield is your lifeline. If it gets destroyed, it will respawn on the map. Race to retrieve it and regain your protection to continue your survival.
- Gradual Difficulty: As time progresses, the challenge intensifies. Survive as long as possible against the escalating waves of lasers and slimes.
- Reflex Testing: Hone your reflexes and quick thinking to dodge lasers and slimes, making every second count in this high-stakes arena.
- Strategic Gameplay: Plan your movements and shield rescues carefully to maximize your survival time and outlast the relentless onslaught.
- Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping experience in "Clash of Swords and Beams"! Can you survive the chaos and emerge victorious? Only the most skilled will prevail!
